pkgmetadata.longdescription: Correlation of Bivariate Survival Times // Estimates correlation coefficients with associated confidence limits for bivariate, partially censored survival times. Uses the iterative multiple imputation approach proposed by Schemper, Kaider, Wakounig and Heinze, Statistics in Medicine 2013. Provides a scatterplot function to visualize the bivariate distribution, either on the original time scale or as copula.
